  • Method Details

    • createReservation

      void createReservation(List<Vehicle> availablevehicles, int VehicleId, String username, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Creates a new reservation based on the provided information.
      Parameters:
      availableVehicles - The list of available vehicles.
      vehicleId - The ID of the selected vehicle.
      username - The username of the customer making the reservation.
      startDate - The start date of the reservation.
      endDate - The end date of the reservation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.

    • getReservationsByCustomerId

      List<Reservation> getReservationsByCustomerId(String username)
      Retrieves reservations based on the provided customer username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer.
      Returns:
      The list of reservations made by the customer.

    • cancelReservation

      void cancelReservation(int reservationId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, ReservationException
      Cancels a reservation based on the provided reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to be canceled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.
      ReservationException - If an error occurs while canceling the reservation.

    • getAllReservationDetails

      List<Reservation> getAllReservationDetails()
      Retrieves all reservation details.
      Returns:
      The list of all reservations in the system.

    • getVehicleUtilization

      void getVehicleUtilization()
      Calculates and displays vehicle utilization statistics.

    • getTotalRevenueByVehicle

      void getTotalRevenueByVehicle()
      Calculates and displays total revenue by vehicle.

    • getTotalRevenueByCustomer

      void getTotalRevenueByCustomer()
      Calculates and displays total revenue by customer.

    • confirmReservation

      void confirmReservation(int reservationId)
      Confirms a reservation based on the provided reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to be confirmed.
